1.title: Abc Galaxy: M, N,

episode of.title: ABC Galaxy: New Space Adventures (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Join Giggs and Hugg as they travel the ABC GALAXY. In this episode they visit planets M, N and O. Come and learn all about the Alphabet.

imdb.title: ABC Galaxy: New Space Adventures
akas: ABC Galaxy: New Space Adventures (United States)
plot: Meet Giggs and Hugg - two adorable friends that form the "Intergalactic Rescue Team". In their special scrap-like spaceship, they travel and explore the "ABC Galaxy".
